member.name: T:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase
member.summary: A Purchase resource indicates the status of a user's subscription purchase.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.AutoRenewing
member.summary: Whether the subscription will automatically be renewed when it reaches its current expiry time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.InitiationTimestampMsec
member.summary: Time at which the subscription was granted, in milliseconds since Epoch.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.Kind
member.summary: This kind represents a subscriptionPurchase object in the androidpublisher service.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.Data.SubscriptionPurchase.ValidUntilTimestampMsec
member.summary: Time at which the subscription will expire, in milliseconds since Epoch.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.AndroidpublisherService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.Cancel(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Cancels a user's subscription purchase. The subscription remains valid until its expiration time.
member.param: Required - The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').
Required - The purchased subscription ID (for example, 'monthly001').
Required - The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a user's subscription purchase is valid and returns its expiry time.
member.param: Required - The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').
Required - The purchased subscription ID (for example, 'monthly001').
Required - The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.CancelRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.CancelRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.CancelRequest.PackageName
member.summary: The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.CancelRequest.Token
member.summary: The token provided to the user's device when the subscription was purchased.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.GetRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.GetRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Androidpublisher.v1.PurchasesResource.GetRequest.PackageName
member.summary: The package name of the application for which this subscription was purchased (for example, 'com.some.thing').
